definitions.definition: Erroneous in date ; containing an anachronism ; in a wrong time ; not applicable to or not appropriate for the time.
examples: If you know where to look in the movie, you can spot an anachronistic wrist watch on one of the Roman soldiers.

definitions.definition: Having opinions from the past; preferring things or values of the past; behind the times ; overly conservative .

main_definition: Erroneous in date ; containing an anachronism ; in a wrong time ; not applicable to or not appropriate for the time.
secondary_definitions: ( Can we verify this sense?) ( of a person ) Having opinions from the past; preferring things or values of the past; behind the times ; overly conservative .
